actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for payment in all cases of lump-sum death payments.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to require lump-sum death payments to be made in the manner provided with respect to payment of underpayments to survivors or heirs when the eligible person is deceased.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for payment in all cases of lump-sum death payments.
